name: Colosseum
fullText:
The @OREsupply team has been building deep in the mines for the past few months.

They have emerged with new version of Ore set to launch soon on mainnet.

Reach out to @HardhatChad and @neil_shahani if you want beta access. https://t.co/aoVxPJovaa
